name: Lost Flowers
description:
Welcome to Ethery, you don't really know who you are but your soul seems to be linked to this world.

In a very colorful and floral universe, you will have to overcome the evil that wishes to corrupt this harmony.

Featuring:

  • 2D openworld
  • Friendly Controls
  • Tiny pixel art graphics
  • Exploration and puzzle
  • Colorful game
